contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Carte_gabon.png|thumb|right|250px|Map of Gabon]] [[File:Libreville1.jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Libreville]], Capital of [[Gabon]]]] [[File:POG-From The Air.jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Port-Gentil]]]] This is a list of cities and towns in [[Gabon]]: *[[Akok]] *[[Bakoumba]] *[[Batouala]] *[[Belinga]] *[[Bifoun]] *[[Bitam]] *[[Bongoville]] *[[Booué]] *[[Cocobeach]] *[[Ekata]] *[[Eteke]] *[[Fougamou]] *[[Franceville]] *[[Gamba, Gabon|Gamba]] *[[Kango]] *[[Koulamoutou]] *[[Lalara]] *[[Lambaréné]] *[[Lastoursville]] *[[Leconi]] *[[Libreville]] (capital) *[[Makokou]] *[[Mayumba]] *[[Mbigou]] *[[Médouneu]] *[[Mékambo]] *[[Mimongo]] *[[Minvoul]] *[[Mitzic]] *[[Moanda]] *[[Momo, Gabon|Momo]] *[[Mouila]] *[[Mounana]] *[[Ndendé]] *[[Ndjolé]] *[[Nkan]] *[[Nkolabona]] *[[Ntoum]] *[[Okandja]] *[[Omboué]] (also known as Fernan Vaz) *[[Owendo]] *[[Oyem]] *[[Petit Loango]] *[[Point Denis]] *[[Port-Gentil]] *[[Santa Clara, Gabon|Santa Clara]] *[[Sette Cama]] *[[Ste. Marie]] *[[Tchibanga]] *[[Tsogni]] *[[Zoula]] {| class="wikitable" |----- |colspan="6" align="center" bgcolor="#FFA500" | '''Cities of Gabon''' |----- |rowspan="2" align="center" bgcolor="#98FB98" | '''Order''' || rowspan="2" align="center" bgcolor="#98FB98" | '''City''' || colspan="2" align="center" bgcolor="#98FB98" | '''Population''' || rowspan="2" align="center" bgcolor="#98FB98" | '''Province''' |----- |align="center" bgcolor="#98FB98" | '''Census 1993''' || align="center" bgcolor="#98FB98" | '''2006 (calculated)''' |----- |align=right | 1. || [[Libreville]] || align=right | 419,596 || align=right | 591,356 || [[Estuaire Province|Estuaire]] |----- |align=right | 2. || [[Port-Gentil]] || align=right | 79,225 || align=right | 111,655 || [[Ogooué-Maritime]] |----- |align=right | 3. || [[Franceville|Masuku (Franceville)]] || align=right | 31,183 || align=right | 43,948 || [[Haut-Ogooué]] |----- |align=right | 4. || [[Oyem]] || align=right | 22,404 || align=right | 31,575 || [[Woleu-Ntem]] |----- |align=right | 5. || [[Moanda]] || align=right | 21,882 || align=right | 30,839 || [[Haut-Ogooué]] |----- |align=right | 6. || [[Mouila]] || align=right | 16,307 || align=right | 22,982 || [[Ngounié]] |----- |align=right | 7. || [[Lambaréné]] || align=right | 15,033 || align=right | 21,187 || [[Moyen-Ogooué]] |----- |align=right | 8. || [[Tchibanga]] || align=right | 14,054 || align=right | 19,807 || [[Nyanga Province|Nyanga]] |----- |align=right | 9. || [[Koulamoutou]] || align=right | 11,773 || align=right | 16,592 || [[Ogooué-Lolo]] |----- |align=right | 10. || [[Makokou]] || align=right | 9,849 || align=right | 13,881 || [[Ogooué-Ivindo]] |} {{Africa in topic|List of cities in}} {{Gabon topics}} [[Category:Lists of cities by country|Gabon, List of cities in]] [[Category:Populated places in Gabon| ]] [[Category:Lists of cities in Africa|Gabon]] [[Category:Gabon-related lists|Cities]] [[it:Gabon#Città principali]]
